00210         : Read the CSR and return 1/0 based on what.
00211           except for what == CSR_FULL where it returns current CSR
00212  Input: 
00213   DWORD base_addr     : base address of the SIS3803
00214   DWORD what          : bitwise field (see sis3803.h)
00215  Output:
00216     none
00217  Function value:
00218  DWORD             : CSR 32bit current content
00219 \**************************************************************/
00220 {
00221    volatile DWORD *spec_adr;
00222 
00223    spec_adr = (DWORD *) (A32D24 + base_adr + CSR_READ);
00224    if (what == CSR_FULL)
00225       return *spec_adr;
00226    else
00227       return ((*spec_adr & what) ? 1 : 0);
00228 }
